    • get

      public static Field get(Class<?> clazz, String fieldName, @Nullable Class<?> compatibleWith)
      Parameters:
      compatibleWith - the field type must assignable from this type, i.e. objects of type compatibleWith must be assignable to the field
      Throws:
      ReflectionException - if field cannot be found

    • isAssignable

      public static boolean isAssignable(Field field, @Nullable Object value)
      Returns:
      true if the given value can be assigned to the given field, i.e. is compatible with the field's type
